email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton as a middle ground. Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan for 18-20 October? Also, please confirm the vessel’s availability for those dates. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the MV Ocean Star is confirmed available for 18-20 October. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement with the agreed terms: $51.25 per metric ton, 72 hours laytime, and $25,000 per day demurrage. I’ll send the draft shortly. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, sounds good. Please include the incoterms as CFR Rotterdam in the agreement. Looking forward to the draft. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the draft charter party agreement has been sent. It includes the CFR Rotterdam incoterms as requested. Let me know if you need any adjustments. Best, Sarah
